title: The After Show Catches Up on Listener Mail
itunes:title: The After Show Catches Up on Listener Mail
description:
This week, The After Show focused on listener feedback. Tune in to see what our listeners have on their minds.  The After show is brought to you by Roma Craft Tobac.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
